column3: You'll have to excuse the additional commit 8cbb6ee that got in here. I tried to confine that commit to pull request #690 only, but that didn't work apparently.\n
Please test with the latest master, I've committed a small fix (no longer indirectly call show() in the constructor of BitcoinGUI) that might make a difference in this. \n
